explains: v. 遵守（abide by）；容忍，忍受；<旧>居住，逗留；（感情，记忆）始终不渝，持续
wordGroup: abide by 遵守；信守；承担…的后果
abide by the law 遵守法律
abide by the contract 遵守合同

sentences.en: They have got to abide by the rules.
You'll have to abide by the rules of the club.
sentences.cn: 你必须遵守俱乐部的规定。

sentences.en: We are not free agents; we abide by the decisions of our president.
sentences.cn: 我们不是自由不需负责任的人；我们遵守总统的决定。
